pages.title: resume
pages.text: Resume Song Hyun Kim Interests Meeting People Photography Design Programming Computer Science Skills fluent in Korean fluent in English Frontend Web Backend Web through Spring Web Design with HTML & CSS Python C, C++, C#, JAVA BigData + AI etc Education Monte Kelly (Kelly College UK) GCSE GCE(AAAAB) (2008 ~ 2012) </a> <!--Link--> <a href="http://www.cuk.edu/"> <li>고려사이버대학교<br> 소프트웨어공학과<br> The Cyber University of Korea<br> (Software Engineering)<br> (2016 ~ 2018)<br><br> </li> </a> <a href="https://www.seoultech.ac.kr/"> <li>국립서울과학기술대학교<br> 컴퓨터공학과<br> Seoul National University of Science and Technology<br> (Computer Science)<br> (2019 ~ 2020)<br> </li> </a> Experience Completed military service as sergeant(2014) Medical Enzyme Therapy Maintainer(2015) December Hotel Floor Manager(2016) MediaWill Jeju SalesAgent(2017) Marriott Jeju Resort Concierge + Bell(2017) Hyundai Construction Equipment OEM Factory(2018) Wedding Hall Museum Waiter(2019) KTCS Telemarketer(2020) etc Extracurriculars Song Hyun Kim

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
